headerDisplay: Converts FTP uploads into HTTP motion alerts that homebridge-camera-ffmpeg understands

name.title: Name
name.description: A unique name for the accessory.

ftp_port.title: Local FTP Port
ftp_port.description: The port to run the FTP server on.

http_port.title: HTTP Port
http_port.description: The HTTP port used by homebridge-camera-ffmpeg.

name.title: Camera Name
name.description: Name of your camera. (Needs to be the same as in homebridge-camera-ffmpeg config)

server.title: Remote FTP Server
server.description: Hostname or IP address of the FTP server to upload to. If not set, files will be stored locally.

port.title: Remote FTP Port
port.description: Port of the remote FTP server.

username.title: Remote FTP Username
username.description: Username of the remote FTP server. If not set, no authentication will be used.

password.title: Remote FTP Password
password.description: Password of the remote FTP server. If not set, no authentication will be used.

tls.title: Use TLS
tls.description: Should TLS be used to connect to remote FTP server?

path.title: Storage Path
path.description: The location to store incoming images. If FTP Server is not set, it will be treated as a local path. If neither this nor FTP Server are set, images will not be stored.
